code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="/api/appointments";const bookAppointment=async appointmentData=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/book"),appointmentData,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("token"))}});return response.data;};const getBarberSchedule=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/schedule"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem("token"))}});return response.data;};const appointmentService={bookAppointment,getBarberSchedule};export default appointmentService;
